TextEng: Why do you call me Judge?
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Did you write the notes in those chests?
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 그 상자 안에 있는 쪽지들을 당신이 쓴 건가요?

TextEng: Who are you?
What is this place? Who is Lord over this castle?
Text: 여기가 어디죠? 이 성의 주인은 누구입니까?

TextEng: Why do you haunt this place, Spirit?
Why you call me Judge?
Huh? What this place be? Who be Lord here?
Why you haunt castle, ghostie?
Text: 왜 너 성에 붙어 있어, 유령아?

TextEng: Hmph. Who you be?
Tell me more...
Get to the point, will you?
Yuh? Ooh, you tell more...
Hmph. You have point, yuh? Get to it.
Text: 흥. 너 핵심 있어, 응? 빨리 말해.

TextEng: Tell me more...
Get to the point, will you?
Yuh? Ooh, you tell more...
Hmph. You have point, yuh? Get to it.
Text: 흥. 너 핵심 있어, 응? 빨리 말해.

TextEng: I have some questions first, Spirit.
Text: 먼저 몇 가지 질문이 있습니다, 영령이시여.

TextEng: Very well. I shall return to you with the oaths.
Uh, me have questions, yuh?
Yuh, okay. Me return with oaths.
Text: 응, 알았어. 나 서약 갖고 돌아올게.

TextEng: I'm not your Judge and I'm *not* visiting your stupid towers!
Text: 난 당신의 판사가 아니고 그 어리석은 탑들에도 가지 않을 거예요!

TextEng: Hmph. This 'Judge' stuff is stupid. Me go now.
Text: 흥. 이 '판사' 소리 바보같아. 나 간다.

TextEng: Quint's one of the accused? Didn't I see him earlier?
Text: 퀸트가 피고인 중 하나라고요? 제가 전에 그를 본 것 같은데요?

TextEng: What is this crime over which I stand in Judgment?
Will you accept any Judgment? Any at all?
Text: 어떤 판결이든 받아들일 건가요? 정말 아무 판결이든요?

TextEng: What if I choose to kill the brothers Jhareg?
Text: 자렉 형제를 죽이면 어떻게 되는 겁니까?

TextEng: All right, enough questions.
Quint? He trapped up there? But me see him earlier, yuh?
Text: 퀸트? 거기 갇혀 있어? 근데 나 전에 봤는데, 응?

TextEng: You okay with any kind of Judgment? Ooh, this be fun!
Text: 너 무슨 판결이든 괜찮아? 오, 이거 재밌겠다!

TextEng: What if me kill da Jhareg fellas instead?
Text: 내가 자렉 형제들 대신 죽이면 어떻게 돼?

TextEng: Okay, 'nuff questions, yuh?
Uh, what be da crime?
Oaths? What oaths?
Yes.
No.
Can you refresh my memory about what's going on here?
Text: 무슨 일인지 다시 한번 설명해 주시겠습니까?

TextEng: Oaths? Why you want oaths?
Uh, me forget da story here. You tell me again, yuh?
Text: 어, 나 여기 이야기 까먹었어. 너 다시 말해줘, 응?

TextEng: Both Quint's and Karlat's.
Quint's.
Karlat's.
Sorry, I was mistaken. I don't have either.
Text: 죄송합니다, 제가 착각했네요. 둘 다 없어요.

TextEng: Uh... Oops! Me no have nothing...
Yes, I am ready.
No, I still need time to think about it.
Text: 아니요, 아직 좀 더 생각할 시간이 필요합니다.

TextEng: Yuh, okay. Me give Judgment now.
Text: 응, 알았어. 나 지금 판결 내릴게.

TextEng: No, me still need to think it through a li'l.
Text: 아니, 나 아직 좀 더 생각해봐야 돼.

TextEng: I find Quint guilty. Give the phylactery to Karlat.
I find Karlat guilty. Destroy the phylactery.
I find neither Quint nor Karlat guilty of the crime.
Me find Quint guilty. You give philacta-thingy to Karlat, yuh?
Text: 나 퀸트가 나쁜 놈이라 생각해. 너 성구함 칼랏한테 줘, 응?

TextEng: Me find Karlat guilty. You destroy philacta-thingy.
Text: 나 칼랏이 나쁜 놈이라 생각해. 너 성구함 파괴해.

TextEng: Me find both Quint and Karlat innocent.
Text: 나 퀸트랑 칼랏 둘 다 안 나빠.

TextEng: I have the written oath of the demon Belial.
Me have da oath of da demon-guy, Belial.
I have no evidence, Spirit.
Me no have evidence, Miss Spirit.
I shall take the phylactery myself.
You shall guard it as you always have, Spirit.
Text: 영령이시여, 지금까지 그래왔듯 당신이 계속 지키시면 됩니다.

TextEng: Uh, me take philacta-thingy meself, yuh?
Text: 어, 나 성구함 내가 가질래, 응?

TextEng: Uh, you keep it, just like always, okay?
Text: 어, 너 그냥 계속 가지고 있어, 알았지?

TextEng: Judgment? I don't understand what's going on.
Text: 판결이라고요? 무슨 일인지 이해가 안 되는데요.

TextEng: Judgment? Huh? Me no understand...
It was simple. Quint admitted his own guilt.
I found Karlat's cause to be most just.
The Judge's heart is <his/hers> alone. Ask no more.
Text: 판사의 마음은 판사 자신의 것입니다. 더 묻지 마세요.

TextEng: I chose randomly between them.
Easy. That Quint guy say he guilty... out loud, even!
Text: 쉬워. 그 퀸트 놈이 자기가 나쁜 놈이라고 말했어... 크게 말하기까지 했어!

TextEng: Uh, me think Karlat be good guy, yuh?
Text: 어, 나 칼랏이 좋은 사람 같아, 응?

TextEng: Haha! It easy! Me just flip coin!
Text: 하하! 쉬워! 나 그냥 동전 던졌어!

TextEng: That be da Judge's secret, yuh?
Yes, give me the Morninglord's account.
No. The hour is late. Let us adjourn this court.
Yuh, tell me what da Morning-guy say.
No. It be late. We all go home now.
Text: 아니. 늦었어. 우리 다 집에 가자.

TextEng: Karlat's story didn't hold up to scrutiny.
I found Quint's cause to be most just.
Karlat be just a big, fat liar.
Uh, me think Quint be good guy, yuh?
Text: 어, 나 퀸트가 좋은 사람 같아, 응?

TextEng: We all must be free, be it to do evil or good.
Text: 모두가 자유로워야 합니다. 악이든 선이든 선택할 자유 말입니다.

TextEng: I didn't realize this would be the consequence.
Evil? Good? It don't matter. Only freedom.
Text: 악? 선? 상관없어. 오직 자유만 중요해.

TextEng: Uh, me thought this end up different...
Text: 어, 나 이거 다르게 끝날 줄 알았는데...

TextEng: In their own way, everyone is guilty.
In da end, everybody be guilty, yuh?
